original_title: Wishing you a happy Sinhala & Tamil New Year
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – New1st wishes all Sri Lankans a happy and properous Sinhala and Tamil New Year!
Sri Lanka and Ireland Face Off in 1st Test Match at Galle International Cricket Stadium
Experience the Tradition of Anointing during the Sinhala and Tamil New Year today
First-ever Malaria vaccine approved for use in Ghana. Malaria kills 620,000 annually
Saudia Airbus A330 hit by gunfire at Sudan’s Khartoum Airport. Passengers safe
